tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE voters_feedback (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_id INT NOT NULL,
    feedback TEXT NOT NULL,
    concern TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE FeedbackResponses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_id INT,
    feedback_id INT,
    response_text TEXT,
    response_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (voter_id) REFERENCES VoterDetails(voter_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (feedback_id) REFERENCES VoterFeedback(voter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ResponseReactions (
    reaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    response_id INT,
    reaction_type VARCHAR(20),
    reaction_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (response_id) REFERENCES FeedbackResponses(response_id)
);
